name: Alex
headline: The Cursor for Xcode
description:
Tired of switching tabs to cursor every time you're building your iOS app in Xcode?

Worry not!

Alex is a sidebar app that works directly with Xcode, and has the same Cmd+L, Cmd+K, and Apply Code commands as Cursor. And, it's super fast.

Check it out: https://alexcodes.app

founders.name: Daniel Edrisian, Founder
founders.description: I'm an iOS Engineer, formerly built the iOS app for ElevenLabs and was a founding engineer at FlutterFlow (YC W21). Prior to that, I interned at Apple, Meta, and Google.

## Agents, Voice Mode, and Project Memories.
A brand new way to interact with Alex. Just sit back and relax.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Command+L
Select text in Xcode and instantly chat with it. Just like Cursor.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Image Chat
Drag any image into the sidebar, and let Alex generate code for it.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Codebase Search
Search your entire codebase for anything, semantically.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Command+K
Quickly spin up an in-file suggestions into code.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Fast Apply Code
Quickly apply code to your file.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Autofix Errors
Click the button and fix the error.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Advanced Semantic File Search
Ask what you're looking for, then hit tab.
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Automatic File Creation
Refactor your files without lifting a finger.
## Pricing
Try Alex with Xcode for free!
Free
$0/mo
  * 50 Chat Messages
  * 5 Code Applies
  * 50 Tab-to-Complete
  * 5 Voice Inputs
  * 5 Git Commit Messages


[Download Free](https://alexcodes.app/<https:/github.com/DanielEdrisian/AlexSideBar-Public/releases/download/prod/AlexSideBar.dmg>)
Popular
Pro - Agent
$20/mo
  * Unlimited DeepSeek R1
  * 500 Claude 3.5 Sonnet Messages / month
  * Unlimited Code Applies
  * Unlimited Tab-to-Complete
  * Whisper Voice Inputs
  * Git Commit Generation
  * + top-up for $9 / 250 messages


[Start Trial (7 days)](https://alexcodes.app/<https:/github.com/DanielEdrisian/AlexSideBar-Public/releases/download/prod/AlexSideBar.dmg>)
### How Chat Messages Work
Every month, you get 500 Chat messages. When you run out, you can top-up for $9 / 250 messages.
‚Ä¢ You can get multiple top-ups (e.g. 2x $9 for 500 messages)
‚Ä¢ Your top-ups roll over to the next month
‚Ä¢ Monthly 500 messages do not roll over
Human vs Agent Messages
Every human message is the same as a follow-up message that the agent takes (since they are both the same LLM call to Claude 3.5 Sonnet). So they both count as 1 chat message.
What abut o1 messages?
You can buy $9 top-ups for 25 o1 messages. And just like the Chat messages, they roll over to the next month.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Alex**

Founded in 2024 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch F24, Alex is on a mission to streamline the iOS development experience with its innovative tool, the Alex Sidebar. Located in a yet-to-be-disclosed environment, the company operates with a lean team of just one employee‚Äîan indicator of the startup's nimble approach to solving developer pain points.

**The Problem**

Every iOS developer knows the struggle: constantly switching tabs in Xcode is tedious and interrupts the flow of coding. Alex was born out of the frustration of this workflow inefficiency. The team set out to create a solution that removes these friction points‚Äîhence the Alex Sidebar.

**The Solution: Alex Sidebar**

This app serves as a powerful AI copilot for Xcode, allowing developers to quickly access functionalities that usually require several clicks or tab switches. It features commands analogous to popular tools, like Cmd+L and Cmd+K for quick text selection and code application, making it snappy and user-friendly.

**Key Features:**

- **Instant Chat**: Select text in Xcode and start a conversation about it right away.
- **Image Chat**: Drag an image into the sidebar to generate corresponding code.
- **Semantic Codebase Search**: Grip your entire codebase semantically to find what you need.
- **Fast Code Apply**: Apply changes to your code rapidly.
- **Error Autofix**: One-click solutions to common coding errors.
- **Automatic File Creation**: Refactor and create files without manual intervention. 

**Pricing Structure:**

Alex offers a free plan‚Äîideal for newcomers and those curious about the tool‚Äîallowing for limited chat and code applications. For more serious developers, a Pro plan is available for $20 per month, featuring unlimited capabilities.

**Community Engagement:**

Alex encourages interaction through its community Discord channel, making it clear that user feedback and engagement are prioritized in their development process.

**Why This Matters:**

As software development grows increasingly complex, the tools we use must evolve as well. Alex recognizes the need for faster, more integrated development environments, and seeks to equip developers with the tools necessary to maintain focus and productivity.

For those weary of tab-switching and looking for a smoother coding experience, Alex may just be the sidebar solution they‚Äôve been searching for. 

Check out more about Alex and download it [here](https://alexcodes.app).
